root: ^Victoria questions who you are and why you're here
^You tell her Victoria your story and that you're just trying to find your friend and get out of here
^Victoria tells you that you can't leave now that you're a Vartra.
^Victoria gives a brief history of this world and of Vartra.
^Victoria tells you she'll tell you where Felix is if you do something for her too
^Victoria tells you about The Labs and asks for you to blow it up
